channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Mailer Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Mailer Plugin

item.title: CVE-2022-20614|2024-08-03T02:17:52.949Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20mailer%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins Mailer Plugin 391.ve4a_38c1b_cf4b_ and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read access to use the DNS used by the Jenkins instance to resolve an attacker-specified hostname.

item.title: CVE-2022-20613|2024-08-03T02:17:52.870Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20mailer%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins Mailer Plugin 391.ve4a_38c1b_cf4b_ and earlier allows attackers to use the DNS used by the Jenkins instance to resolve an attacker-specified hostname.
